member.name: T:Enemies.Zombie
member.summary: Represents a Zombie within the game environment, with health as a defining attribute.

member.name: F:Enemies.Zombie.health
member.summary: Represents the health of the Zombie.

member.name: M:Enemies.Zombie.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with health set to 0.
